attributes.title: Common Roots Cafe -- Baked mac and cheese
attributes.description:
Created on December 2, 2010 by dpeters on Sourcemap.org:

If you order the baked mac and cheese at Common Roots Cafe in Minneapolis, this is where the ingredients come from. Cafe owner Danny Schwartzman says that when he measures in terms of cost, most of his ingredients come from within a 250-mile radius. The information here was supplied by Schwartzman, and the map was created by Minnesota Public Radio News' Ground Level project. www.mpr.org/groundlevel.
